betterquesting:10.desc:8: To unlock the Alchemy research, you'll need to complete Section 2: Crafting Alchemical Brass Ingots in the Metals Alchemy research, then go to the Fundamentals realm (not Mystic Fundamentals), click on Research Discoveries: Alchemy, and then scan for an item with a mechanical element to it (such as a button), which unlocks the Alchemy chapter as well as unlocking the recipe for an important item: the Goggles of Revealing. \n\nWhile for some skilled Mystics, this item is optional in the early stages, for most Mystics, especially those just starting out, it is recommended to get together the materials to make one now, which shows the number of elements contained in a crucible/jar/steamer and other containers that hold source material. You can also observe the amount of elements needed for enchanting and the risk level of enchanting, so it's very convenient. \Unlike TC4, you can put it on the jewelry bar without losing the 5% aura reduction.
